projects.title: H.A.M.P.T.E.R.
projects.description: Retro-futuristic robot design for the game Neon Overdrive Based on ED-209 from Robocop

details.title: Overview
details.content: H.A.M.P.T.E.R. is a retro-futuristic robot designed for the game Neon Overdrive. Comprised of nostalgic 80s sci-fi aesthetics.

details.title: Technical Details
details.content: The model was created using Blender for the base mesh and then rigging, Textured in Substance Painter. The final implementation and material setup was done in Unreal Engine

details.title: Key Features
details.content:
• Modular design
• Advanced material system with dynamic wear and tear
• Each weapon system has a damaged counterpart

specifications.rigging: Full IK and Target rig controls

projects.title: A.R.T.I.M.E.S.
projects.description: Tank type mech design for the game Neon Overdrive

details.title: Overview
details.content: A.R.T.I.M.E.S. is a more aggressive tank type mech for higher damage output and defense.

details.title: Technical Details
details.content: The model was created using Blender for the base mesh and then rigging, Textured in Substance Painter. The final implementation and material setup was done in Unreal Engine. the treads are animated using a simple panning texture to simulate movement.

details.title: Key Features
details.content:
• Modular design
• Advanced material system with dynamic wear and tear
• Each weapon system was supposed to have a damaged counterpart same as the H.A.M.P.T.E.R. design.

specifications.rigging: Full IK and Target rig controls
